譥字的基本解释

譥
jiào
古同“叫”，痛呼。

譥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiào］
［《廣韻》古弔切，去嘯，見。］
(1)大声呼叫。
(2)攻击别人的短处，揭发别人的阴私。

譥字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　譥； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1183第04
【唐韻】古弔切【集韻】【韻會】吉弔切，?音叫。【說文】痛呼也。【玉篇】大呼也。【廣韻】痛聲。又訐也。【前漢·藝文志】及譥者爲之，則苟鉤鈲析亂而已。

譥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
譥字的起名意思

暂无。

Xi
Basic explanation of words
Xi
jiào
Gu Tong "screamed" and cried out painfully.
Xi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiào］
["Guangyun" ancient hanging cut, go to Xiao, see. ]
(1) Call out loudly.
(2) Attack other people's shortcomings and expose others' secrets.
Xi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　譥; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 1183 04
[Tang Yun] Ancient hanging cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ji hanging cut, sound called. [Said the text] Pain. [Jade articles] Shout out. [Guang Yun] Pain. Also scornful. 【Pre-Han·Arts and Literature History】and the people who did it, it was just a chaos.
